original_text: Then Solomon offered up burnt offerings to the Lord on the altar of the Lord that he had built before the vestibule,
korean_text: 솔로몬이 낭실 앞에 쌓은 여호와의 제단 위에 여호와께 번제를 드리되

sentences.original_text: Then Solomon offered up burnt offerings to the Lord
on the altar of the Lord
that he had built before the vestibule,
